fields.question: Why did we start building SMS solutions?
fields.answer: We saw some existing SMS services, but they were lacking, and we wanted to improve them.

fields.question: Our Mission
fields.answer: To provide simple SMS solutions to businesses to improve guest service.

fields.question: How do I sign up?
fields.answer: At this time our product is still under development.  Please contact us to let you know that you are interested, and we're going to be giving extra benefits to our early adopters.

fields.question: Can employees have SMS signatures
fields.answer: Yes. You can enable or disable SMS signatures. You can use a generic SMS signature for you business, or unique based on the employee that is replying to the guest.

fields.question: Can we automate responses?
fields.answer: Yes, you can automate welcome responses and thank you for staying responses. When guests sign up or are done using the service.

fields.question: How many SMS phone numbers to we have?
fields.answer: All SMS go to a central SMS number for your business.  Then any employee responsible for responding to guest requests can help.  The SMS phone number is a local phone number based on your business' area code.

fields.question: What are some of the benefits?
fields.answer: Improved guest service. You can help your customers without them having to wait on the phone.  Once they give you their phone number, you will know who they are, and can get strait to helping them with what they need.

fields.question: Ho does billing and renewal work?
fields.answer: Billing is done on a pay-as-you-go basis.  You would sign up for an initial amount of funds to deposit.  Then this balance will recharge when you hit the refill amount that you set for your account.

fields.question: How to I get help if I have questions?
fields.answer: At this time, since the product is still under development, please contact us via email or phone.
